MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G76 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.14am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:51am on Wednesday, 03 February 2021
